            "url": "https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/36132189", 
            "userName": "Flora走世界", 
            "userLink": "https://www.zhihu.com/people/1b3b933f2257266f43ef27082625e48b", 
            "upvote": 1, 
            "title": "探寻《美女与野兽》的绝美古堡，感受中世纪的浪漫气息", 
            "content": "<p>把香波堡列入旅行清单，源自于古堡情节。想去看看《美女与野兽》的原型城堡，想去看看城堡的花园中是否种满了玫瑰花，想去感受一下童话般的浪漫气息。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dd30b9e0d0f96381458011790866cac2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dd30b9e0d0f96381458011790866cac2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dd30b9e0d0f96381458011790866cac2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dd30b9e0d0f96381458011790866cac2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>香波堡坐落于卢瓦尔河畔，从巴黎驱车前往需三个多小时。卢瓦尔河是法国的第一大河，全长约1000公里，蜿蜒流淌，不仅孕育了两岸的生命，也有着厚重的历史积淀。</p><p>卢瓦尔河畔，尤其是中段河谷地区，两岸植被茂盛、绿树葳蕤，动物在此繁衍生息，是盛夏消暑、策马行猎的好去处。因此，法国皇室在此兴建了众多城堡，用以避暑狩猎，这也使得卢瓦尔河畔有“法国后花园”之称。而众多中世纪古堡之中，规模最大，最雄伟气派的非香波堡莫属。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d2443d1a4c9525b605a8054c8c24bf9a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d2443d1a4c9525b605a8054c8c24bf9a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;1280&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d2443d1a4c9525b605a8054c8c24bf9a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d2443d1a4c9525b605a8054c8c24bf9a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>抵达香波堡时，正值阴天，冷风萧肃，远远瞥见香波堡，门窗紧闭，颇有贝儿老爸误入城堡时的阴森恐怖气息，不由望而生畏。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68ea7d090f3791f2142dfbdd0490d419_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1090\" data-rawheight=\"1090\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1090\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68ea7d090f3791f2142dfbdd0490d419_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1090&#39; height=&#39;1090&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1090\" data-rawheight=\"1090\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1090\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68ea7d090f3791f2142dfbdd0490d419_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68ea7d090f3791f2142dfbdd0490d419_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在前往城堡的路上，当地居民支起小摊，兜售自家酿的葡萄酒、自己做的果酱或是糖果，热情招呼旅客免费试吃。游客虽少，但添了很多生气，觉得这古堡也没有这么冷清了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66e436bb7c38b52bda0cdfc56da87614_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1200\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1200\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66e436bb7c38b52bda0cdfc56da87614_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1200&#39; height=&#39;900&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1200\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1200\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66e436bb7c38b52bda0cdfc56da87614_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66e436bb7c38b52bda0cdfc56da87614_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>绕到城堡正面时，就彻底被它征服了。它挺拔俊秀、华丽端庄、高贵又不失神秘。屋顶的每一个棱角都一丝不苟，透露着皇权的威严。无怪乎连骑行的路人都纷纷下车，拿出手机拍照留念。</p><p>作为法国皇室极尽奢华、炫耀国力的象征，想必当年弗朗索瓦一世在此宴请宿敌——神圣罗马帝国皇帝查理五世时，内心一定无比骄傲和自豪吧。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-865ebc40f60c12b3b1b6b00b5b29437f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-865ebc40f60c12b3b1b6b00b5b29437f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-865ebc40f60c12b3b1b6b00b5b29437f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-865ebc40f60c12b3b1b6b00b5b29437f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>香波堡拥有440个房间、365个壁炉、13个主楼梯和70个副楼梯，在布局和豪华程度上，足以和凡尔赛宫相媲美。自1519年法国国王弗朗索瓦一世主持修筑工程开始，至路易十四执政期间城堡修筑工程收尾，香波堡前前后后修建了163年。如果再算上城堡修整和周边的整治工程，整个工期则长达229年。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ffea6d63084e8e1ad515c54145e60d9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1200\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1200\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ffea6d63084e8e1ad515c54145e60d9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1200&#39; height=&#39;900&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1200\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1200\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ffea6d63084e8e1ad515c54145e60d9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ffea6d63084e8e1ad515c54145e60d9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>香波堡一共分为四层。一楼中最具特色、最有意思的设计就是著名的双螺旋楼梯：上下楼梯的人会看见对方，却永远都不会相遇。</p><p>虽然从外观上看，双螺旋楼梯和普通楼梯一般，并无任何差别；事实上，它是由两组独立的楼梯相互交错，围绕一个轴心，螺旋式盘旋而上。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a8f6837ab41b119d62d46c71d284c91_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1200\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1200\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a8f6837ab41b119d62d46c71d284c91_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1200&#39; height=&#39;900&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1200\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1200\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a8f6837ab41b119d62d46c71d284c91_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a8f6837ab41b119d62d46c71d284c91_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>相传是弗朗索瓦一世为避免王后和情妇们正面相遇的尴尬，特地邀请达芬奇设计。这里也成为了法国王室名流的爱情约会圣地：世界上最远的距离是近在咫尺，却永远都无法碰触彼此。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45ba3759d8773c2b0ffb29d6bb544050_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1090\" data-rawheight=\"1091\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1090\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45ba3759d8773c2b0ffb29d6bb544050_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1090&#39; height=&#39;1091&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1090\" data-rawheight=\"1091\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1090\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45ba3759d8773c2b0ffb29d6bb544050_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45ba3759d8773c2b0ffb29d6bb544050_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>环绕楼梯的每一层楼都会延伸出四条走廊，并形成四个完全一样的区域。不管这条楼梯是否是达芬奇设计，确实是建筑一绝：上下楼梯时，永远不曾想到原来还有另外一组楼梯独立存在，对面的人明明近在眼前，却永远都抓不到，十分有趣。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-bd8ebe0882c83ff2618ff9f06fb329ea_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"945\" data-rawheight=\"1260\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"945\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-bd8ebe0882c83ff2618ff9f06fb329ea_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;945&#39; height=&#39;1260&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"945\" data-rawheight=\"1260\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"945\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-bd8ebe0882c83ff2618ff9f06fb329ea_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-bd8ebe0882c83ff2618ff9f06fb329ea_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>二楼分布着法国国王弗朗索瓦一世及王后的卧室、礼仪接待套间、客房套间和礼拜堂。王室的寝宫从装饰到家具都十分朴素，甚至有些寒酸。如果不明就里，还会调侃一下：法国皇室也太节俭了吧，是否把城堡的面子工程做足，就可以不管里子了？</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a6e593774841d9eaf04136276fd2109e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"961\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a6e593774841d9eaf04136276fd2109e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;961&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"961\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a6e593774841d9eaf04136276fd2109e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a6e593774841d9eaf04136276fd2109e_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a4623b84589db29f73d15483ace77f6f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1115\" data-rawheight=\"836\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1115\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a4623b84589db29f73d15483ace77f6f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1115&#39; height=&#39;836&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1115\" data-rawheight=\"836\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1115\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a4623b84589db29f73d15483ace77f6f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a4623b84589db29f73d15483ace77f6f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>事实上，香波堡作为国王的狩猎行宫，除了狩猎季节，其他时间处于闲置状态。每年当国王宣布狩猎之行开始，并决定下榻此处时，所有的用品包括：床幔、装饰物、日用品、炊具、食物及国王喜爱的家具都会随着皇家狩猎团浩浩荡荡的搬至此处。等狩猎结束，再搬回巴黎。因此，城堡本身的装饰和家具都一切从简了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b7f2d8e9cecbc9f03cb5080eaaa8e31e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1140\" data-rawheight=\"855\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1140\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b7f2d8e9cecbc9f03cb5080eaaa8e31e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1140&#39; height=&#39;855&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1140\" data-rawheight=\"855\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1140\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b7f2d8e9cecbc9f03cb5080eaaa8e31e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b7f2d8e9cecbc9f03cb5080eaaa8e31e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>法国国王路易十四的卧室占据了城堡的中心位置，连通两间房间。对比弗朗索瓦一世的卧室，装饰更加华贵精美。路易十四在位期间，十分钟爱香波堡，1668年后还将宫廷搬至于此。</p><p>P.S. 从床的尺寸来看，路易十四确实没多高啊。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f4c1ed1a727dc0efcdf8b4095d98d949_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1157\" data-rawheight=\"867\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1157\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f4c1ed1a727dc0efcdf8b4095d98d949_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1157&#39; height=&#39;867&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1157\" data-rawheight=\"867\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1157\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f4c1ed1a727dc0efcdf8b4095d98d949_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f4c1ed1a727dc0efcdf8b4095d98d949_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>三楼的雕花拱顶上雕刻了弗朗索瓦一世的花体首字母F和个人象征——蝾螈。中世纪的欧洲，蝾螈被视为火之精灵，充满了传奇色彩。弗朗索瓦一世借此传递了自己的座右铭：“我点燃正义之火，并熄灭罪恶之火”。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c6c2cd872956abd2ca1c0d74ec584215_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c6c2cd872956abd2ca1c0d74ec584215_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c6c2cd872956abd2ca1c0d74ec584215_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c6c2cd872956abd2ca1c0d74ec584215_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>三楼原有的装饰和家具已不复存在，不知是在法国大革命中损毁还是早已搬至卢浮宫保存。取而代之的是展览厅中现代艺术和文化的点缀，使得三楼的陈列不那么空旷。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3e227c004d6cb8b9315d5a64c1b35d25_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1360\" data-rawheight=\"1360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1360\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3e227c004d6cb8b9315d5a64c1b35d25_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1360&#39; height=&#39;1360&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1360\" data-rawheight=\"1360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1360\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3e227c004d6cb8b9315d5a64c1b35d25_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3e227c004d6cb8b9315d5a64c1b35d25_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>登至四楼天台，终于可以近距离欣赏到屋顶壮阔的景致。香波堡的主体就是普通的长方形堡垒，然而屋顶的塔尖却十分华美，高耸的哥特建筑风格和意大利文艺复兴风格相得益彰，共同成就了香波堡的完美。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2ca5c4db339313a25fa540d825a776fd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"1200\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2ca5c4db339313a25fa540d825a776fd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;1200&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"1200\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2ca5c4db339313a25fa540d825a776fd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2ca5c4db339313a25fa540d825a776fd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>建筑上简与繁的融合，装饰上菱形和圆形相互点缀，创意之中不失对称和谐，当之无愧是意大利辉煌艺术和建筑风格融入法国的典型范例。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a700973ad3b5bcafa8d41a8d55e72a00_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"870\" data-rawheight=\"1160\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"870\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a700973ad3b5bcafa8d41a8d55e72a00_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;870&#39; height=&#39;1160&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"870\" data-rawheight=\"1160\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"870\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a700973ad3b5bcafa8d41a8d55e72a00_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a700973ad3b5bcafa8d41a8d55e72a00_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在天台香波堡的全景尽收眼底，也许是非狩猎季节、也许是法国大革命时花园的布局和结构早已损毁，早已不见当年皇室狩猎的兴盛繁华。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bb2f6ed8f893e5cd5528e24cb5146d43_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1250\" data-rawheight=\"937\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1250\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bb2f6ed8f893e5cd5528e24cb5146d43_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1250&#39; height=&#39;937&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1250\" data-rawheight=\"937\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1250\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bb2f6ed8f893e5cd5528e24cb5146d43_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bb2f6ed8f893e5cd5528e24cb5146d43_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>当年弗朗索瓦一世和路易十四在此挥斥方遒、意气风发。香波堡不仅是皇权和艺术的完美结合，也见证了法国王室的荣辱兴衰。如今，香波堡因为《美女和野兽》而再度声名鹊起，被赋予了童话般的梦幻色彩，成为法兰西浪漫的代表之一。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-34dbdc340bac6bfa1eb742f65f8e0b5f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2448\" data-rawheight=\"3264\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2448\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-34dbdc340bac6bfa1eb742f65f8e0b5f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2448&#39; height=&#39;3264&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2448\" data-rawheight=\"3264\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2448\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-34dbdc340bac6bfa1eb742f65f8e0b5f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-34dbdc340bac6bfa1eb742f65f8e0b5f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>————————————————</p><p>游记首发于我的微信公众号「 Flora走世界 」(Flora_onthetrip) ，并已委托维权骑士（<a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=http%3A//rightknights.com\" class=\" external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\"><span class=\"invisible\">http://</span><span class=\"visible\">rightknights.com</span><span class=\"invisible\"></span></a>）为我的文章进行维权行动。</p><p>个人知乎专栏：<a href=\"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/floraonthetrip\" class=\"internal\">Flora走世界</a>。</p><p>微信公众号 &amp;             "title": "巴黎博物馆：一场艺术的朝圣之旅", 
            "content": "<p>逛巴黎博物馆的经历和感受，远远出乎我的意料。</p><p>那些被印在历史书上、早已看过无数遍的画作，那些被奉为圭臬、早已熟捻于心的艺术作品，我以为我早已习惯了它们的存在，我以为我会索然无味、意兴阑珊。</p><p>真正站在这些艺术珍品面前的时候，却意外的从心（怂）了，不敢疏忽造次，不敢傲慢无礼。穷困潦倒也好，疾病缠身也罢，艺术家们将毕生心血都倾注在艺术上，这样的作品是有灵魂的。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fdfd4c2c7548be0d97f16ba4efbdda80_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"820\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fdfd4c2c7548be0d97f16ba4efbdda80_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1220&#39; height=&#39;820&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"820\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fdfd4c2c7548be0d97f16ba4efbdda80_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fdfd4c2c7548be0d97f16ba4efbdda80_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>他们画出了忠贞不渝、画出了虔诚敬畏、画出了气势磅礴、画出了姹紫嫣红，也画出了绝望寂寥、和痛苦挣扎。</p><p>对无数用毕生心血筑起艺术殿堂的大师们，深深致敬。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ee6e3e5aa90bae09e05302baa1254cfa_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"1220\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ee6e3e5aa90bae09e05302baa1254cfa_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;915&#39; height=&#39;1220&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"1220\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ee6e3e5aa90bae09e05302baa1254cfa_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ee6e3e5aa90bae09e05302baa1254cfa_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2>卢浮宫</h2><p>经过800余年的扩建和重修，卢浮宫大到好似迷宫一般，世界四大博物馆之首名不虚传。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2dae89f9f6398381b495d665f3d92cfd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"941\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2dae89f9f6398381b495d665f3d92cfd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;941&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"941\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2dae89f9f6398381b495d665f3d92cfd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2dae89f9f6398381b495d665f3d92cfd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>贝聿铭巧妙的抓住了欧洲人对古埃及文化的痴迷，独具匠心的为卢浮宫博物馆入口打造了一座玻璃金字塔，如今已成为巴黎旅行打卡必备。艺术，永远不会局限于时间和空间的限制。古埃及人的智慧，借由东方人的巧思，为法国巴黎建筑留下了又一传世之作。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e9bf3858b8aecc4644745bb5e0710bd8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1030\" data-rawheight=\"958\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1030\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e9bf3858b8aecc4644745bb5e0710bd8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1030&#39; height=&#39;958&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1030\" data-rawheight=\"958\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1030\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e9bf3858b8aecc4644745bb5e0710bd8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e9bf3858b8aecc4644745bb5e0710bd8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>卢浮宫一共分为三个馆：叙利馆、德农馆和黎塞留馆。三馆交相辉映，共同保存了卢浮宫的40多万件珍贵藏品，包含雕塑、绘画、美术工艺、古代东方、古代埃及和古希腊罗马等六个门类。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5fe5d102f23fd5838be47814f88da427_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1560\" data-rawheight=\"1560\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1560\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5fe5d102f23fd5838be47814f88da427_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1560&#39; height=&#39;1560&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1560\" data-rawheight=\"1560\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1560\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5fe5d102f23fd5838be47814f88da427_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5fe5d102f23fd5838be47814f88da427_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>如果你对古文明很感兴趣，就会在叙利馆和德农馆流连忘返；如果你喜欢看雕塑，就会在德农馆和黎塞留馆看到很多席地而坐、对着雕塑临摹的人；如果你想静静的欣赏绘画，那德农馆的件件真迹都会让你大饱眼福。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6ccacc4485c4167bc5a474d9b1c4e073_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"980\" data-rawheight=\"980\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"980\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6ccacc4485c4167bc5a474d9b1c4e073_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;980&#39; height=&#39;980&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"980\" data-rawheight=\"980\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"980\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6ccacc4485c4167bc5a474d9b1c4e073_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6ccacc4485c4167bc5a474d9b1c4e073_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-399dd8b33c0719f1d5d543351ff51b97_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1030\" data-rawheight=\"1030\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1030\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-399dd8b33c0719f1d5d543351ff51b97_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1030&#39; height=&#39;1030&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1030\" data-rawheight=\"1030\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1030\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-399dd8b33c0719f1d5d543351ff51b97_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-399dd8b33c0719f1d5d543351ff51b97_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>每位远道而来的游客心心念念的三件镇馆之宝：维纳斯位于叙利馆，胜利女神像和蒙娜丽莎的微笑位于德农馆。虽然分布在不同馆，但三件藏品间隔的距离并不远，为方便游客在最短的时间把最重要的作品参观完，馆内也会有清晰的线路指引。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-543038e8b5a3d6082bde235151aae131_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1360\" data-rawheight=\"1360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1360\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-543038e8b5a3d6082bde235151aae131_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1360&#39; height=&#39;1360&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1360\" data-rawheight=\"1360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1360\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-543038e8b5a3d6082bde235151aae131_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-543038e8b5a3d6082bde235151aae131_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>胜利女神的观赏位置十分人性化：雕塑立在通道中央，两边台阶通往不同展馆，游客可以坐在台阶上慢慢欣赏。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b4101a9f003549990580ed466519bc5c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1604\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b4101a9f003549990580ed466519bc5c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1604&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1604\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b4101a9f003549990580ed466519bc5c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b4101a9f003549990580ed466519bc5c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>胜利女神的雕塑，绝世而独立，迎风吹起的裙摆褶皱栩栩如生，气势形态十分逼真，仍可以想象胜利女神站在船头，迎风而立，高举右手，宣布胜利的英姿。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c73cdbbd30ff599f710803c3b739b30e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1620\" data-rawheight=\"1620\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1620\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c73cdbbd30ff599f710803c3b739b30e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1620&#39; height=&#39;1620&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1620\" data-rawheight=\"1620\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1620\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c73cdbbd30ff599f710803c3b739b30e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c73cdbbd30ff599f710803c3b739b30e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>分隔线简单粗暴的将《蒙娜丽莎的微笑》和游客隔开了，分分钟营造出一种“世界上最远的距离，就是我和蒙娜丽莎之间的距离”的错觉。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fdd9c11a7c9651a29f3e996200427d42_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"915\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fdd9c11a7c9651a29f3e996200427d42_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1220&#39; height=&#39;915&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"915\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fdd9c11a7c9651a29f3e996200427d42_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fdd9c11a7c9651a29f3e996200427d42_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>找到了蒙娜丽莎，就找到了那些年承包了我们历史课本的“配图”了。无论是荷拉斯兄弟刚毅笔直的线条，还是胜利女神领导人民的史诗气息，无论是拿破仑一世和约瑟芬皇后加冕的不朽时刻，还是梅杜莎之筏对海难者入木三分的刻画，历经了百年，仍色彩如初，百看不厌。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ae4933f78bc1d59deeee3408842cbc84_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1050\" data-rawheight=\"1050\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1050\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ae4933f78bc1d59deeee3408842cbc84_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1050&#39; height=&#39;1050&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1050\" data-rawheight=\"1050\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1050\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ae4933f78bc1d59deeee3408842cbc84_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ae4933f78bc1d59deeee3408842cbc84_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>这些作品明明早已看过无数遍，然而站在真迹面前的那一份撼动、被深深吸引的那一份入迷，唯有身临其境，才能真正体会。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7a5508158dc55176ade1ede65acef9ac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1200\" data-rawheight=\"870\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1200\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7a5508158dc55176ade1ede65acef9ac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1200&#39; height=&#39;870&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1200\" data-rawheight=\"870\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1200\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7a5508158dc55176ade1ede65acef9ac_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7a5508158dc55176ade1ede65acef9ac_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>对古埃及文化的迷恋，让我把大部分的时间都贡献给了叙利馆中的古埃及文物。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d172bfda990ce62dafe7098c3d36aedb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1030\" data-rawheight=\"1030\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1030\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d172bfda990ce62dafe7098c3d36aedb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1030&#39; height=&#39;1030&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1030\" data-rawheight=\"1030\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1030\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d172bfda990ce62dafe7098c3d36aedb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d172bfda990ce62dafe7098c3d36aedb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>欧洲人对古埃及文化是极为崇尚的：庙宇的门柱都不计成本、不计距离的运回法国；</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-61d2314dfa8757eb529d708c782c42c1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"840\" data-rawheight=\"1120\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"840\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-61d2314dfa8757eb529d708c782c42c1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;840&#39; height=&#39;1120&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"840\" data-rawheight=\"1120\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"840\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-61d2314dfa8757eb529d708c782c42c1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-61d2314dfa8757eb529d708c782c42c1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>木乃伊的石棺及棺椁层层摆放；象形文字的彩绘石碑、摆放木乃伊内脏的器皿、古埃及人所用的金银首饰和陶罐更是不计其数。数量之多，范围之广，藏品之精细程度，足可以让游客对古埃及的灿烂文化叹为观止。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-80b15afc0e817ccfa12a9db502478328_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"1040\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-80b15afc0e817ccfa12a9db502478328_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1040&#39; height=&#39;1040&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"1040\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-80b15afc0e817ccfa12a9db502478328_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-80b15afc0e817ccfa12a9db502478328_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b644dfffa9b8aaf372bf87c38677eb70_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b644dfffa9b8aaf372bf87c38677eb70_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1020&#39; height=&#39;1020&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b644dfffa9b8aaf372bf87c38677eb70_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b644dfffa9b8aaf372bf87c38677eb70_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>看到这些古埃及藏品，内心是极为复杂的：说不清是憎恨法国人贪婪，抢掠了其他国家的文化遗产；还是感怀中东局势不稳，觉得这些藏品在卢浮宫也不失为一个好去处。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-17c17ef9ff6ba547a6d3cc161416f3a8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"1040\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-17c17ef9ff6ba547a6d3cc161416f3a8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1040&#39; height=&#39;1040&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"1040\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-17c17ef9ff6ba547a6d3cc161416f3a8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-17c17ef9ff6ba547a6d3cc161416f3a8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>黎塞留馆，终于找到了我身后的汉谟拉比法典。这座在两河文明中熠熠生辉的楔形文字法典，因为周杰伦的《爱在西元前》在中国广为人知。历经千年烽火，还能保存如此完好，实属难得。如今，这座法典静静的落在卢浮宫，向来往的游客默默的宣告古巴比伦昔日的辉煌。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-056b234821e3baa41f980b40dd2a3069_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1090\" data-rawheight=\"1091\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1090\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-056b234821e3baa41f980b40dd2a3069_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1090&#39; height=&#39;1091&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1090\" data-rawheight=\"1091\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1090\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-056b234821e3baa41f980b40dd2a3069_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-056b234821e3baa41f980b40dd2a3069_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>黎塞留馆和叙利馆共同保存了大量古波斯和古巴比伦的藏品，虽然不比古埃及的藏品精致繁复，但对于中国人而言反而更为亲切一些：不知小昭回到波斯之后是否一统拜火教，无人能敌。下图上方的翼状图案就是拜火教的标志哦。日日对着如此粗犷不羁的浮雕，小昭会不会很想念中原？</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-05cab3e701e531a7d9138c7d0c329347_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"940\" data-rawheight=\"940\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"940\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-05cab3e701e531a7d9138c7d0c329347_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;940&#39; height=&#39;940&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"940\" data-rawheight=\"940\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"940\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-05cab3e701e531a7d9138c7d0c329347_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-05cab3e701e531a7d9138c7d0c329347_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>让人颇为意外的是，大名鼎鼎、四大博物馆之首的卢浮宫也有复制品：这幅《马拉之死》的真迹藏于比利时布鲁塞尔皇家美术馆。不知是出于艺术价值考量，还是政治缘由，在馆内收藏了一幅复制品。马拉的功过众说纷纭，但这幅《马拉之死》的艺术价值是毋庸置疑的。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-086bf069c5f646495f9bfbdfb151261a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"1040\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-086bf069c5f646495f9bfbdfb151261a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1040&#39; height=&#39;1040&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"1040\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-086bf069c5f646495f9bfbdfb151261a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-086bf069c5f646495f9bfbdfb151261a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>卢浮宫中，选一间少有游客的展厅，静静的坐着，身边挂满了人类艺术史的集大成之作，与有荣焉，何其幸运！</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-85fbf23ff5e6837b02d83520570843e2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1120\" data-rawheight=\"1120\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1120\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-85fbf23ff5e6837b02d83520570843e2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1120&#39; height=&#39;1120&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1120\" data-rawheight=\"1120\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1120\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-85fbf23ff5e6837b02d83520570843e2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-85fbf23ff5e6837b02d83520570843e2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>如果以后我的孩子想要从事于艺术，我不会再责难他：能赚钱吗？有编制吗？是体制内吗。。。投身于艺术，是件多么美妙的事情啊！愿你一直都有此般犀利不屑的眼神，怼回所有质疑你的庸俗之人：）</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-192be1b596d4cd14ce462e7c6c8c6c07_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1180\" data-rawheight=\"859\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1180\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-192be1b596d4cd14ce462e7c6c8c6c07_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1180&#39; height=&#39;859&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1180\" data-rawheight=\"859\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1180\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-192be1b596d4cd14ce462e7c6c8c6c07_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-192be1b596d4cd14ce462e7c6c8c6c07_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2>奥赛博物馆</h2><p>废弃的奥赛火车站，经过巴黎设计师的改造，以及法国政府的多年经营，已成为巴黎三大博物馆之一，每年迎来送往无数旅人，比起当年火车站的光景，肯定愈加热闹非凡。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bc2a39960f1a3b85457958e3f34de3fd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"961\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bc2a39960f1a3b85457958e3f34de3fd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;961&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"961\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bc2a39960f1a3b85457958e3f34de3fd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bc2a39960f1a3b85457958e3f34de3fd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>奥赛博物馆保留了原有火车站的设计：中间是由西往东、一通到底的大厅，大厅两侧是独立的一间间展厅，共三层。作为奥赛的门面担当，门口的大钟，精致古朴，满满的中世纪风情，提醒着旅人不要错过火车啦~漫步其中，忍不住问：是否不管进入哪个厅，都会有霍格沃茨特快列车等着我？</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9cb8bcbe4d398a4a995bed9905b38d6d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"1040\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9cb8bcbe4d398a4a995bed9905b38d6d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1040&#39; height=&#39;1040&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"1040\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9cb8bcbe4d398a4a995bed9905b38d6d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9cb8bcbe4d398a4a995bed9905b38d6d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在奥赛，会轻松许多：因为这里规模看上去不是很大，逛完还是有希望的，终于不需要面对“时间有限，到底要看A，还是B？”这些个头疼的选择了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e87ae002a64f2b959ad48226a950e186_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"1010\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e87ae002a64f2b959ad48226a950e186_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1010&#39; height=&#39;1010&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"1010\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e87ae002a64f2b959ad48226a950e186_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e87ae002a64f2b959ad48226a950e186_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在奥赛，雕塑就摆在通道，放在拐角，不设玻璃罩，不设防护线，旅客可以近距离、从各个角度仔细观摩。这样的摆放方式，打破了人与艺术的隔阂，让艺术变得触手可及，觉得十分亲近：艺术十分高贵，但并非只供在神坛。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9cca5f4cd4dc8122e62eecbc67394e36_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1470\" data-rawheight=\"1644\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1470\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9cca5f4cd4dc8122e62eecbc67394e36_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1470&#39; height=&#39;1644&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1470\" data-rawheight=\"1644\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1470\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9cca5f4cd4dc8122e62eecbc67394e36_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9cca5f4cd4dc8122e62eecbc67394e36_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>奥赛，是收藏印象派主要画作最多的地方，也被称作印象主义画家的天堂。因此，这里会看到大量莫奈、马奈、雷诺阿、塞尚、梵高等大师的作品。印象派对光影有着极致的追求，尽管他们笔下的人物和景色没有那么精细，但都显得格外的真实和灵动。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9c43f42074e1768c64438f0914ec108d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"990\" data-rawheight=\"879\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"990\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9c43f42074e1768c64438f0914ec108d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;990&#39; height=&#39;879&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"990\" data-rawheight=\"879\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"990\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9c43f42074e1768c64438f0914ec108d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9c43f42074e1768c64438f0914ec108d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>喜欢看雷诺阿《红磨坊的舞会》，树荫下点点阳光映衬的欢声笑语；喜欢看莫奈《蒙特戈依街》和《撑伞的女人》，明亮的色彩烘托出的欢快气息；喜欢在《睡莲》前仔细区分真实和倒影的界限；喜欢《地板刨工》灰褐却又不压抑的色调，真实的表现底层工人工作时的勤恳。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e99192b81741dc801fed15d1ed7ff40d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"854\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e99192b81741dc801fed15d1ed7ff40d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1220&#39; height=&#39;854&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"854\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e99192b81741dc801fed15d1ed7ff40d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e99192b81741dc801fed15d1ed7ff40d_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0d69e60925cd11d3eb34cd96923292bf_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1070\" data-rawheight=\"786\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1070\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0d69e60925cd11d3eb34cd96923292bf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1070&#39; height=&#39;786&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1070\" data-rawheight=\"786\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1070\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0d69e60925cd11d3eb34cd96923292bf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0d69e60925cd11d3eb34cd96923292bf_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>梵高的画色彩十分饱满，不知为何，却能够感受到画里透出的阴郁和沉重。站在他的自画像前越久，就越能感受到画者的孤独与倔强，苦闷和无助，内心倍感压抑。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-92a6f4060d7f9efc50cab8c908ee08c4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"877\" data-rawheight=\"1170\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"877\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-92a6f4060d7f9efc50cab8c908ee08c4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;877&#39; height=&#39;1170&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"877\" data-rawheight=\"1170\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"877\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-92a6f4060d7f9efc50cab8c908ee08c4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-92a6f4060d7f9efc50cab8c908ee08c4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>回想起那首《Vincent》中的“starry starry night, paint your palette blue and grey”（星光，星光闪耀的夜晚，调色板描绘出你深深的忧郁和晦暗），莫名的湿了眼眶。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-51553682b4107e02f23c8a52bbd6da07_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1120\" data-rawheight=\"893\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1120\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-51553682b4107e02f23c8a52bbd6da07_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1120&#39; height=&#39;893&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1120\" data-rawheight=\"893\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1120\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-51553682b4107e02f23c8a52bbd6da07_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-51553682b4107e02f23c8a52bbd6da07_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>奥赛博物馆每到固定时间，都会安排乐队在大钟下进行表演。考虑到大众游客，表演的曲目大都欢快愉悦；再配上五颜六色的彩灯，格外的赏心悦目。如果梵高的自画像真的有灵魂的话，希望梵高先生在奥赛能住得开心一些。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ca4dc69035d21939727a8449b0d583ea_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"943\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ca4dc69035d21939727a8449b0d583ea_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;943&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"943\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ca4dc69035d21939727a8449b0d583ea_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ca4dc69035d21939727a8449b0d583ea_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2>橘园美术馆</h2><p>相比梵高，莫奈是十分幸运的，大器晚成，可以在晚年尽情画自己喜欢的池塘、小桥和睡莲，还有橘园美术馆来保存他的八幅印象派组画：睡莲。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7f0fb3172c58b190f947ecdd0f85d567_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1250\" data-rawheight=\"937\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1250\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7f0fb3172c58b190f947ecdd0f85d567_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1250&#39; height=&#39;937&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1250\" data-rawheight=\"937\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1250\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7f0fb3172c58b190f947ecdd0f85d567_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7f0fb3172c58b190f947ecdd0f85d567_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>睡莲的展厅一共有两间，每一间都是环形构造。四面墙上分别挂着四幅巨型睡莲，展示了由清晨到黄昏的睡莲池塘、云朵和倒影。莫奈用椭圆的环形的组合，意图展示睡莲池塘无边无际的感觉，力求空间的延展和联合。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-35df10d495397c2a9d2752e7d08bd078_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1260\" data-rawheight=\"945\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1260\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-35df10d495397c2a9d2752e7d08bd078_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1260&#39; height=&#39;945&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1260\" data-rawheight=\"945\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1260\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-35df10d495397c2a9d2752e7d08bd078_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-35df10d495397c2a9d2752e7d08bd078_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8c99b57e19d802f5358f5712ae5552b3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1240\" data-rawheight=\"930\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1240\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8c99b57e19d802f5358f5712ae5552b3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1240&#39; height=&#39;930&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1240\" data-rawheight=\"930\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1240\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8c99b57e19d802f5358f5712ae5552b3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8c99b57e19d802f5358f5712ae5552b3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>尽管每一幅睡莲看上去都是蓝黑的底色，也没有清晰明确的轮廓线，但每一处的细节都经得起考究和推敲，随便一处截下来，都独立成画。水光潋滟，静默无声。淡淡的几朵睡莲下，就是深邃的倒影，色彩浓厚，透出一份深不见底的神秘感。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-57a348b5debac72dd806967a10e6d6e0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-57a348b5debac72dd806967a10e6d6e0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1020&#39; height=&#39;1020&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-57a348b5debac72dd806967a10e6d6e0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-57a348b5debac72dd806967a10e6d6e0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>莫奈晚年深受白内障的折磨，几近失明。尽管如此，也从未放下过画笔。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f72e9c79dac0732912b80da466160be9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f72e9c79dac0732912b80da466160be9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1020&#39; height=&#39;1020&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f72e9c79dac0732912b80da466160be9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f72e9c79dac0732912b80da466160be9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>早上和中午的光亮一下，画下的睡莲就多些，颜色稍微明亮一些。到晚上，光线黯淡了，视线模糊了，画下的景致也就不多了，色彩也沉了下来。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2341d4f4e98dd5776644f9e925699566_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"990\" data-rawheight=\"990\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"990\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2341d4f4e98dd5776644f9e925699566_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;990&#39; height=&#39;990&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"990\" data-rawheight=\"990\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"990\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2341d4f4e98dd5776644f9e925699566_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2341d4f4e98dd5776644f9e925699566_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>莫奈晚年从事巨幅睡莲的创作时，印象派的黄金期已过，已不再受到众人追捧。对艺术多么热忱，保有怎样的执着，才能做到即使近乎失明，即使不被世人理解，也笔耕不辍。现如今，每每提及印象派，就会想起莫奈，想起他的睡莲，这样传世不朽的印象，莫奈绝对是当得起的。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b31388ff63c7dc429e1d9e6de8c55fd7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1400\" data-rawheight=\"1050\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1400\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b31388ff63c7dc429e1d9e6de8c55fd7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1400&#39; height=&#39;1050&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1400\" data-rawheight=\"1050\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1400\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b31388ff63c7dc429e1d9e6de8c55fd7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b31388ff63c7dc429e1d9e6de8c55fd7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>橘园除了莫奈的睡莲，橘园的地下二楼也收藏了印象派雷诺阿、塞尚等大师的作品，以及现代派画家毕加索、马蒂斯和高更的作品。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-49233edcc3696b35d439095fb6b3cca2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"943\" data-rawheight=\"1230\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"943\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-49233edcc3696b35d439095fb6b3cca2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;943&#39; height=&#39;1230&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"943\" data-rawheight=\"1230\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"943\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-49233edcc3696b35d439095fb6b3cca2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-49233edcc3696b35d439095fb6b3cca2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>这座小而精的博物馆，虽然藏品时间跨度仅仅百年，却向世人浓缩展示了艺术史上最为绚丽的精彩片段。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2e96eddede28beebfb808803a96f72c9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1190\" data-rawheight=\"938\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1190\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2e96eddede28beebfb808803a96f72c9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1190&#39; height=&#39;938&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1190\" data-rawheight=\"938\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1190\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2e96eddede28beebfb808803a96f72c9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2e96eddede28beebfb808803a96f72c9_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2>蓬皮杜艺术中心</h2><p>蓬皮杜艺术中心和卢浮宫、奥赛博物馆并称为巴黎三大艺术博物馆，集中展示了法国20世纪的文化艺术。这个由钢管和玻璃管组成的庞然大物，设计构造十分标新立异，外墙布满五颜六色的管线和钢铁横架。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6be642955aeb206f6dcf87be1462832f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1050\" data-rawheight=\"787\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1050\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6be642955aeb206f6dcf87be1462832f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1050&#39; height=&#39;787&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1050\" data-rawheight=\"787\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1050\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6be642955aeb206f6dcf87be1462832f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6be642955aeb206f6dcf87be1462832f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>钢架林立，管道纵横，好似尚未完工的工地，彻底打破了传统艺术的常规设计，本身就是一件20世纪的艺术杰作。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-58f8e619d6a4f28abce262e3265fd65f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-58f8e619d6a4f28abce262e3265fd65f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;900&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-58f8e619d6a4f28abce262e3265fd65f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-58f8e619d6a4f28abce262e3265fd65f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在蓬皮杜，艺术表现形式很多样性，好像进入了哆啦a梦的百宝袋。暗藏玄机的二维码、随心所欲的涂鸦、五颜六色的灯管、色彩斑斓的拼接小屋...</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-12530facf1c717fe1ba556dbb8dfce70_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"970\" data-rawheight=\"970\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"970\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-12530facf1c717fe1ba556dbb8dfce70_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;970&#39; height=&#39;970&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"970\" data-rawheight=\"970\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"970\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-12530facf1c717fe1ba556dbb8dfce70_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-12530facf1c717fe1ba556dbb8dfce70_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>艺术不再局限在画笔画纸上，留给观众的想象空间也越来越大，与观众的互动性越来越强。甚至任性的把作品的解读权和阐释权直接交给了观众，由观众去体味，去评判。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c10fa50ce2e578447597566023c147c0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"1040\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c10fa50ce2e578447597566023c147c0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1040&#39; height=&#39;1040&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"1040\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c10fa50ce2e578447597566023c147c0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c10fa50ce2e578447597566023c147c0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>对先锋艺术一知半解，还是上几张毕加索和马蒂斯的画镇楼吧！</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-85efb3e7fc70e9b33b4646dca7ea4b0f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"1010\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-85efb3e7fc70e9b33b4646dca7ea4b0f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1010&#39; height=&#39;1010&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"1010\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-85efb3e7fc70e9b33b4646dca7ea4b0f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-85efb3e7fc70e9b33b4646dca7ea4b0f_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0831f8584ce197cbfe6bb01f97795663_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"980\" data-rawheight=\"1116\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"980\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0831f8584ce197cbfe6bb01f97795663_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;980&#39; height=&#39;1116&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"980\" data-rawheight=\"1116\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"980\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0831f8584ce197cbfe6bb01f97795663_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0831f8584ce197cbfe6bb01f97795663_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2>结尾有彩蛋</h2><p>坐在蓬皮杜艺术中心对面晒太阳的街头涂鸦艺人：Life without art is stupid（没有艺术的人生是愚昧的）。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-400fca9e22fd81f201e2b2e7a26c6bdf_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"950\" data-rawheight=\"950\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"950\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-400fca9e22fd81f201e2b2e7a26c6bdf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;950&#39; height=&#39;950&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"950\" data-rawheight=\"950\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"950\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-400fca9e22fd81f201e2b2e7a26c6bdf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-400fca9e22fd81f201e2b2e7a26c6bdf_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>————————————————</p><p>游记首发于我的微信公众号「 Flora走世界 」(Flora_onthetrip) ，并已委托维权骑士（<a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=http%3A//rightknights.com\" class=\" external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\"><span class=\"invisible\">http://</span><span class=\"visible\">rightknights.com</span><span class=\"invisible\"></span></a>）为我的文章进行维权行动。</p><p>个人知乎专栏：<a href=\"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/floraonthetrip\" class=\"internal\">Flora走世界</a>。</p><p>微信公众号 &amp;
