width=&#39;830&#39; height=&#39;830&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"830\" data-rawheight=\"830\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"830\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f54a7992937c04a68725a6dc50c04323_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f54a7992937c04a68725a6dc50c04323_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>当初一颗种子随风掉落在这个小建筑的屋顶上，生根发芽，表面上和建筑和谐共生，实际上，根须早已野蛮的布满了整个建筑的内部。若这颗树可以活动，总觉得会将这个小建筑连根拔起。自然的力量，若无人为的干预，总是会展现出惊人的力量。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e31c8f120c8b7dd7a634dd6a49dcb54e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"824\" data-rawheight=\"992\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"824\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e31c8f120c8b7dd7a634dd6a49dcb54e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;824&#39; height=&#39;992&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"824\" data-rawheight=\"992\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"824\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e31c8f120c8b7dd7a634dd6a49dcb54e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e31c8f120c8b7dd7a634dd6a49dcb54e_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e257697844e27bb7ed1b69ca43733a8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"920\" data-rawheight=\"920\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"920\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e257697844e27bb7ed1b69ca43733a8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;920&#39; height=&#39;920&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"920\" data-rawheight=\"920\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"920\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e257697844e27bb7ed1b69ca43733a8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e257697844e27bb7ed1b69ca43733a8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在柏威夏寺，稍有留心，就能找到柬泰双方交战时留下的子弹痕迹。说是寺庙神圣不可侵犯，却让寺庙成了战场，城墙石柱做了掩体，说到底还是领土主权至上。为了4.6平方公里的争议地段，双方誓死捍卫，战争的恶果都由人民、士兵和柏威夏寺承了过去。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ddbd6c96f75a06ac0b2b21463d4bbc93_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"940\" data-rawheight=\"705\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"940\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ddbd6c96f75a06ac0b2b21463d4bbc93_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;940&#39; height=&#39;705&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"940\" data-rawheight=\"705\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"940\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ddbd6c96f75a06ac0b2b21463d4bbc93_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ddbd6c96f75a06ac0b2b21463d4bbc93_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69883f6b09e96e9eba7e8b0385b8d84d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2448\" data-rawheight=\"2448\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2448\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69883f6b09e96e9eba7e8b0385b8d84d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2448&#39; height=&#39;2448&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2448\" data-rawheight=\"2448\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2448\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69883f6b09e96e9eba7e8b0385b8d84d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69883f6b09e96e9eba7e8b0385b8d84d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>寺庙后面便是悬崖，便是贫瘠的平原，便是泰国。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7c4291f80c3115afa90d02398f8d3634_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1200\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1200\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7c4291f80c3115afa90d02398f8d3634_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1200&#39; height=&#39;900&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1200\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1200\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7c4291f80c3115afa90d02398f8d3634_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7c4291f80c3115afa90d02398f8d3634_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>这里周围都是如此的荒无人烟，供给十分有限，旅客稀稀落落，和偌大的柏威夏寺形成了强烈的对比。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4ab9df1e168ee535376e9414a5c389dd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1090\" data-rawheight=\"816\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1090\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4ab9df1e168ee535376e9414a5c389dd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1090&#39; height=&#39;816&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1090\" data-rawheight=\"816\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1090\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4ab9df1e168ee535376e9414a5c389dd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4ab9df1e168ee535376e9414a5c389dd_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e3c3f66a64e06443116cc8c396fa0a85_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"950\" data-rawheight=\"950\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"950\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e3c3f66a64e06443116cc8c396fa0a85_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;950&#39; height=&#39;950&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"950\" data-rawheight=\"950\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"950\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e3c3f66a64e06443116cc8c396fa0a85_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e3c3f66a64e06443116cc8c396fa0a85_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>相比之下，仍有居民前来拜祭，仍有僧侣坐守于此，仍有热心的管理员用仅有的英语词汇提醒旅客注意台阶，悬崖边仍有香火不断，让人觉得十分感动，忍不住的潸然泪下。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-33c34b24f899d2089e59e57a020ac0dc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"1220\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-33c34b24f899d2089e59e57a020ac0dc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1220&#39; height=&#39;1220&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"1220\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-33c34b24f899d2089e59e57a020ac0dc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-33c34b24f899d2089e59e57a020ac0dc_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1e8f014ff74747a833f8e9047c8acd3a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"1220\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1e8f014ff74747a833f8e9047c8acd3a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1220&#39; height=&#39;1220&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"1220\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1e8f014ff74747a833f8e9047c8acd3a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1e8f014ff74747a833f8e9047c8acd3a_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-49e6391bfa421d11da8e6c8d00b1f383_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1081\" data-rawheight=\"1353\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1081\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-49e6391bfa421d11da8e6c8d00b1f383_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1081&#39; height=&#39;1353&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1081\" data-rawheight=\"1353\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1081\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-49e6391bfa421d11da8e6c8d00b1f383_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-49e6391bfa421d11da8e6c8d00b1f383_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>信仰总是不会因为战火而消逝。穿越时空，穿越战乱，再小的信仰之光都会存留下来，延绵万世。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>贡开金字塔</b></p><p>高棉王朝的伽耶跋摩四世（928～942年）篡位之后，将国都从吴哥迁至贡开（儿子继位后又将都城迁回至吴哥），并大兴土木，前后修建了大大小小几十座庙宇。贡开庙宇遗址群中最与众不同的要属这座金字塔。伽耶跋摩四世直接弃用了婆罗门教（古印度教）传统的五层小塔结构，垒出一座金字塔用来祭祀祈福。在吴哥窟的建筑群中，实属独一无二。在当时，估计是了不得的举动了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-532e4645ae2a25ca0626022c40be5302_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"840\" data-rawheight=\"840\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"840\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-532e4645ae2a25ca0626022c40be5302_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;840&#39; height=&#39;840&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"840\" data-rawheight=\"840\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"840\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-532e4645ae2a25ca0626022c40be5302_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-532e4645ae2a25ca0626022c40be5302_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>贡开金字塔距离暹粒约有三个半小时的车程。6号公路是柬埔寨少数能拿得出手的公路了，尽管公路上一盏路灯都没有。这三个半小时看尽了沿途的荒凉，终于抵达了贡开金字塔。</p><p>金字塔外早已破败不堪，已经完全辨认不出来原来建筑的模样了。仅存不多的庙宇用木架勉强支撑着，岌岌可危。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-47fe914f267158cb5c84878a8ac59591_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"860\" data-rawheight=\"860\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"860\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-47fe914f267158cb5c84878a8ac59591_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;860&#39; height=&#39;860&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"860\" data-rawheight=\"860\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"860\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-47fe914f267158cb5c84878a8ac59591_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-47fe914f267158cb5c84878a8ac59591_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a311f90acaefe858ac16e350ffee8e19_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"850\" data-rawheight=\"850\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"850\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a311f90acaefe858ac16e350ffee8e19_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;850&#39; height=&#39;850&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"850\" data-rawheight=\"850\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"850\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a311f90acaefe858ac16e350ffee8e19_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a311f90acaefe858ac16e350ffee8e19_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>想要来金字塔祈福必须要穿过红庙。别看这红庙不起眼，这已经是贡开金字塔附近保存比较完整的建筑了。尽管早已残破不堪，但仍可以辨认出当初建造者采用了五层小塔的小砖结构来修建红庙。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-60093492e2f55c3a19cace992141a697_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"860\" data-rawheight=\"860\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"860\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-60093492e2f55c3a19cace992141a697_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;860&#39; height=&#39;860&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"860\" data-rawheight=\"860\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"860\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-60093492e2f55c3a19cace992141a697_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-60093492e2f55c3a19cace992141a697_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>红庙外的石柱纷纷倒塌，榕树趁虚而入，越过了石柱设下的界线，堂而皇之的和石柱并排站了。想来当年也是回廊的模样，只供王和大臣通过，如今却成为了路人的踏脚石，指引着路人通往神圣的祭祀台。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4f5aab933e7b0e839ac6ef31fdf01e1b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"860\" data-rawheight=\"860\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"860\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4f5aab933e7b0e839ac6ef31fdf01e1b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;860&#39; height=&#39;860&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"860\" data-rawheight=\"860\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"860\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4f5aab933e7b0e839ac6ef31fdf01e1b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4f5aab933e7b0e839ac6ef31fdf01e1b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>穿过红庙，金字塔豁然开朗。与其说是祭祀台，更像是坟冢，荒草丛生，无人打理。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-00dd83cbf2630443a8ef6289dbd6367e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-00dd83cbf2630443a8ef6289dbd6367e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;900&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-00dd83cbf2630443a8ef6289dbd6367e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-00dd83cbf2630443a8ef6289dbd6367e_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e5c15a0e535964a192281b9625bb41e0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"970\" data-rawheight=\"970\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"970\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e5c15a0e535964a192281b9625bb41e0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;970&#39; height=&#39;970&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"970\" data-rawheight=\"970\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"970\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e5c15a0e535964a192281b9625bb41e0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e5c15a0e535964a192281b9625bb41e0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>借由简陋的扶梯爬到金字塔最高点，一望无际的国土就在脚下，是否真有唯我独尊、天人合一的至高荣耀感？</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c3b2e8b28de4813ae398e8dc95281537_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1240\" data-rawheight=\"930\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1240\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c3b2e8b28de4813ae398e8dc95281537_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1240&#39; height=&#39;930&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1240\" data-rawheight=\"930\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1240\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c3b2e8b28de4813ae398e8dc95281537_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c3b2e8b28de4813ae398e8dc95281537_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>曾经，这里是王权的中心，不容侵犯；而今小孩们在金字塔下奔跑嬉戏，因为弄坏了单车而紧张的拨弄着链条。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe5c6029a9a18185c8a445e17ce1c037_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe5c6029a9a18185c8a445e17ce1c037_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;900&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe5c6029a9a18185c8a445e17ce1c037_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe5c6029a9a18185c8a445e17ce1c037_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>曾经，这里的石狮无比狰狞，代表了王权的威严；而今早已模糊了模样，角落的无名小花开得正得意。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9122d7f590f6398b66f20cfa26118a0d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"870\" data-rawheight=\"870\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"870\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9122d7f590f6398b66f20cfa26118a0d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;870&#39; height=&#39;870&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"870\" data-rawheight=\"870\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"870\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9122d7f590f6398b66f20cfa26118a0d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9122d7f590f6398b66f20cfa26118a0d_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-99270a24d8de32051347b3889234e162_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"870\" data-rawheight=\"870\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"870\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-99270a24d8de32051347b3889234e162_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;870&#39; height=&#39;870&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"870\" data-rawheight=\"870\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"870\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-99270a24d8de32051347b3889234e162_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-99270a24d8de32051347b3889234e162_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>曾经，即使是王，也要手脚并用一步一步攀爬至金字塔的顶层，以示对神的敬畏之心；而今，任游客随意俯瞰、凭吊。附近大大小小几十座庙宇都湮没在这丛林之中了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5b25fffd136f1cde3f4cf4f05d3f0c68_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1120\" data-rawheight=\"840\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1120\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5b25fffd136f1cde3f4cf4f05d3f0c68_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1120&#39; height=&#39;840&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1120\" data-rawheight=\"840\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1120\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5b25fffd136f1cde3f4cf4f05d3f0c68_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5b25fffd136f1cde3f4cf4f05d3f0c68_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>离开贡开时，正值日落。夕阳西下，此处再无人问津。</p><p>昔日万邦孤为王，四海沉浮吾独断。</p><p>今朝悚悟广寒中，茕茕孑立如孤魂。</p><p>——Coldplay 《Viva La Vida》</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-433aa2de2531edac669fd9e1030aa1be_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"980\" data-rawheight=\"980\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"980\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-433aa2de2531edac669fd9e1030aa1be_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;980&#39; height=&#39;980&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"980\" data-rawheight=\"980\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"980\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-433aa2de2531edac669fd9e1030aa1be_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-433aa2de2531edac669fd9e1030aa1be_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>————————————————</p><p>游记首发于我的微信公众号「 Flora走世界 」(Flora_onthetrip) ，并已委托维权骑士（<a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=http%3A//rightknights.com\" class=\" external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\"><span class=\"invisible\">http://</span><span class=\"visible\">rightknights.com</span><span class=\"invisible\"></span></a>）为我的文章进行维权行动。</p><p>个人知乎专栏：<a href=\"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/floraonthetrip\" class=\"internal\">Flora走世界</a>。</p><p>微信公众号 &amp;             "title": "一起去探寻《古墓丽影》中的秘境之地吧", 
            "content": "<h2>“翻拍一次”《古墓丽影》</h2><p>吴哥窟的塔布隆寺是《古墓丽影》的取景地。16年前，《古墓丽影》拍摄之时，这里人迹罕至，充满了神秘和未知，宛如秘境之地。如今虽然已成为热门的旅游景点，但身临其中，仍能感觉到这一份神秘气息尚未消退。</p><p>塔布隆寺是12世纪末，吴哥王朝最富盛名的国王阇耶跋摩七世（Jayavarman VII）为了纪念他的母亲而修建的寺庙。去过圣剑寺（七世为了纪念父亲修建的寺庙）的朋友应该知道，塔布隆寺的规模要比圣剑寺更大，殉葬的宝藏也更为丰厚，也许是因为七世太思念自己的母亲，也许是依着高棉女子尊贵的传统。</p><p>从外观而言，塔布隆寺很不起眼，顶上站着一颗榕树，用“一枝红杏出墙来”的妖娆身段，吸引着过往的游客。千万不要被寺庙不起眼的外表迷惑了，如果因为它的外在颜值而错过了它，那你会错过别有洞天的意外惊喜。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-493c3d3b7dda45b186acab9008ac1b52_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"765\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-493c3d3b7dda45b186acab9008ac1b52_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1020&#39; height=&#39;765&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"765\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-493c3d3b7dda45b186acab9008ac1b52_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-493c3d3b7dda45b186acab9008ac1b52_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在《古墓丽影》第一部中，Lara由此进入了寺庙，又跟着小女孩的足迹和指引，掉入了藏有“Triangle of Light”的地下寺。心血来潮，做了一次有趣的“翻拍”。</p><p>Action!</p><p>场景一：Lara追随着蝴蝶而至，把她的越野车停在了塔布隆寺的门口。快点跟上，别掉队了~</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c42cfe65f9c137f3571c414031560c49_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1000\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c42cfe65f9c137f3571c414031560c49_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;1000&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1000\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c42cfe65f9c137f3571c414031560c49_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c42cfe65f9c137f3571c414031560c49_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>场景二：进入塔布隆寺，一切所见，似梦似幻，16年前Lara心里的震撼，16年后作为游客的我依然能够体会到。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af69eed42456384e62bbcb3557224ab7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"937\" data-rawheight=\"1300\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"937\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af69eed42456384e62bbcb3557224ab7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;937&#39; height=&#39;1300&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"937\" data-rawheight=\"1300\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"937\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af69eed42456384e62bbcb3557224ab7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af69eed42456384e62bbcb3557224ab7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>场景三：Lara掏出父亲留下的信，希望能够找到些许线索。线索远在天边，近在眼前，神秘小女孩准备上线。知道结局的我笑而不语。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d96da7a31d79feb230c6fa5f82cf279_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d96da7a31d79feb230c6fa5f82cf279_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1020&#39; height=&#39;1020&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d96da7a31d79feb230c6fa5f82cf279_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d96da7a31d79feb230c6fa5f82cf279_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>场景四：Lara试图找到小女孩，也许能问出些什么。聪明如Lara，知道抢占制高点，眼观六路耳听八方。没有主角光环，实在爬不上去，那就在下面假装和Lara对视下。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-043ba578528659989e74ef559583717e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"1010\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-043ba578528659989e74ef559583717e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1010&#39; height=&#39;1010&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"1010\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-043ba578528659989e74ef559583717e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-043ba578528659989e74ef559583717e_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ed7484bf67444225fee477095ec19e09_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2896\" data-rawheight=\"2896\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2896\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ed7484bf67444225fee477095ec19e09_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2896&#39; height=&#39;2896&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2896\" data-rawheight=\"2896\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2896\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ed7484bf67444225fee477095ec19e09_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ed7484bf67444225fee477095ec19e09_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>场景五：小女孩一直和Lara捉迷藏，Lara一路尾随到了回廊之下，警惕的回头环顾四周。装备输了，侧颜不能输。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-64f636df3d3bcedaa8dee78633835f6d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"1010\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-64f636df3d3bcedaa8dee78633835f6d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1010&#39; height=&#39;1010&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"1010\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-64f636df3d3bcedaa8dee78633835f6d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-64f636df3d3bcedaa8dee78633835f6d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>场景六：穿过回廊，又会是怎样的光景呢？</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6d31062ce0867b7782ef8f4cfe2f6c7c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"966\" data-rawheight=\"1340\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"966\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6d31062ce0867b7782ef8f4cfe2f6c7c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;966&#39; height=&#39;1340&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"966\" data-rawheight=\"1340\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"966\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6d31062ce0867b7782ef8f4cfe2f6c7c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6d31062ce0867b7782ef8f4cfe2f6c7c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>场景七：百转千回，小女孩早已静坐在此，等待解答Lara的疑惑。16年光景，这里的变化最大：小女孩身后的榕树树根几乎延伸到Lara站立的地方；Lara身后的榕树已被砍掉；原来整整齐齐码好的石块被翻得乱七八糟，无处安放，遗弃于此。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-64a4b00cf55f6ed94a286a8e9bd7c54e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"851\" data-rawheight=\"1180\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"851\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-64a4b00cf55f6ed94a286a8e9bd7c54e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;851&#39; height=&#39;1180&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"851\" data-rawheight=\"1180\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"851\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-64a4b00cf55f6ed94a286a8e9bd7c54e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-64a4b00cf55f6ed94a286a8e9bd7c54e_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2>我心中的塔布隆寺</h2><p>虽说《古墓丽影》让吴哥窟一战成名，极大的推动了当地旅游业的发展，但我觉得这部电影并没有完全展现塔布隆寺的美。</p><p>我喜欢这里，是因为这里的榕树。和周边的榕树相比，这里的榕树非常的与众不同的。（下图是屋顶榕树的树根）</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-19ad0f12a88a0279895af8f610cf4c4e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"970\" data-rawheight=\"970\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"970\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-19ad0f12a88a0279895af8f610cf4c4e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;970&#39; height=&#39;970&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"970\" data-rawheight=\"970\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"970\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-19ad0f12a88a0279895af8f610cf4c4e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-19ad0f12a88a0279895af8f610cf4c4e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>我相信，它们本身就是一株株的树灵，否则不会如此不修边幅又拥有克制之心：在肆意生长、根茎粗硕的同时，依然能够小心翼翼的依着寺庙建筑的纹路，遮挡住浮雕不受日晒雨淋，支撑着墙体不受战争侵害而倒塌，与塔布隆寺深深的融为一体，共生共息。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-12ce9875eb7aa9e83496212bc126f5da_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"810\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-12ce9875eb7aa9e83496212bc126f5da_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;810&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"810\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-12ce9875eb7aa9e83496212bc126f5da_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-12ce9875eb7aa9e83496212bc126f5da_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ce47b76b56d12ff914f576dd2259c955_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"825\" data-rawheight=\"1100\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"825\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ce47b76b56d12ff914f576dd2259c955_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;825&#39; height=&#39;1100&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"825\" data-rawheight=\"1100\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"825\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ce47b76b56d12ff914f576dd2259c955_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ce47b76b56d12ff914f576dd2259c955_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>它们看似是自然的入侵者，实则是寺庙的守护者。总觉得一旦砍去这些灵体，回廊、墙体、屋顶都会随之轰塌，塔布隆寺不复存在。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8fa4f19c20a2a65fcbc9006f5af89e98_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"757\" data-rawheight=\"1010\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"757\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8fa4f19c20a2a65fcbc9006f5af89e98_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;757&#39; height=&#39;1010&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"757\" data-rawheight=\"1010\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"757\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8fa4f19c20a2a65fcbc9006f5af89e98_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8fa4f19c20a2a65fcbc9006f5af89e98_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-113f3d0c6794aa488f2b45cf4782a323_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"920\" data-rawheight=\"920\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"920\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-113f3d0c6794aa488f2b45cf4782a323_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;920&#39; height=&#39;920&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"920\" data-rawheight=\"920\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"920\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-113f3d0c6794aa488f2b45cf4782a323_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-113f3d0c6794aa488f2b45cf4782a323_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>也许他们是阇耶跋摩七世对母亲思念的化身。否则这些灵体不会看似粗暴简单，却能够如此忠心耿耿的呵护着这座寺庙。</p><p>人们遗忘了这座寺庙，岁月风化了这座寺庙，它陈旧了，斑驳了，这些榕树却毫不在意，仍旧依附着它，陪伴着它。</p><p>有了思念，有了榕树，塔布隆寺就有了人间的温度。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b75e41d87d26f5702a549aed3ddfb6c1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"757\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b75e41d87d26f5702a549aed3ddfb6c1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1010&#39; height=&#39;757&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"757\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b75e41d87d26f5702a549aed3ddfb6c1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b75e41d87d26f5702a549aed3ddfb6c1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>墙壁的石雕都不见踪影，只剩下空荡荡的凹洞。导游说，都是越南人入侵的时候砸坏的，因为想要毁灭一个国家，先毁灭他们的信仰。繁华兴落，不变的是塔布隆寺不曾消失的对人世的牵挂与不舍。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4eefa37d85ae22af773025cdbfd5eb09_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4eefa37d85ae22af773025cdbfd5eb09_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;900&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4eefa37d85ae22af773025cdbfd5eb09_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4eefa37d85ae22af773025cdbfd5eb09_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2>结尾有彩蛋</h2><p>在塔布隆寺的热门景点处，大家都会有秩序的依次排队照相。一位英国爷爷任性的冲过来，执意要和我合影。旅行无国界，调皮的爷爷笑得好开心啊！</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4e8cb8a9a5036482e27b7f13db996a74_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"780\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4e8cb8a9a5036482e27b7f13db996a74_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1040&#39; height=&#39;780&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1040\" data-rawheight=\"780\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1040\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4e8cb8a9a5036482e27b7f13db996a74_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4e8cb8a9a5036482e27b7f13db996a74_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e4338f82da47afb4ad8cc0964b18c5e9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1050\" data-rawheight=\"787\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1050\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e4338f82da47afb4ad8cc0964b18c5e9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1050&#39; height=&#39;787&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1050\" data-rawheight=\"787\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1050\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e4338f82da47afb4ad8cc0964b18c5e9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e4338f82da47afb4ad8cc0964b18c5e9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>想问为什么人这么少，光影这么好吗，早起的鸟儿有虫吃啊！九点半之后就是下图了！</p><p>试问何德何能，能拼过八位大妈依次轮番独照、组合合影、外加大合照！<b>更大的彩蛋是：这是韩国大妈团啊！</b>全球大妈一家亲，以后谁说中国大妈，可以顺便祭出这张照片了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-175f21a052f57faee88375ab98cd9f64_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"980\" data-rawheight=\"735\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"980\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-175f21a052f57faee88375ab98cd9f64_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "2017年旅行回忆: 再美的风景, 都不及你在身边", 
            "content": "<h2>写在前面的话</h2><p>2017年转眼又要过去了，时间好像被拧上了发条，走得飞快。</p><p>2017年的旅行：2个月，4次海外旅行，7个国家。春节后去了吴哥窟，初夏去了新加坡，夏天在欧洲呆了一个月，冬天去了普吉岛。对比自己想要旅居、不赶时间的愿望，还有一段距离。但旅行前忙着做攻略，选目的地，旅行回来后忙着整理照片，写公众号。所以总感觉自己一直在路上，从未停歇。</p><p>身体和心灵总有一个在路上。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-02d80010db289e390f3c7d90f7a3665a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1600\" data-rawheight=\"1197\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1600\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-02d80010db289e390f3c7d90f7a3665a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1600&#39; height=&#39;1197&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1600\" data-rawheight=\"1197\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1600\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-02d80010db289e390f3c7d90f7a3665a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-02d80010db289e390f3c7d90f7a3665a_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2>一场“佛系”旅行</h2><p><b>2017年2月~3月，吴哥窟，柬埔寨</b></p><p>《孤独星球》百大目的地票选第一的美誉，以及蒋勋先生在《吴哥之美》中不吝辞藻的赞美，让我在2017年的伊始，就进行了一场“佛系”旅行。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7f46a42a09ffc86c21a6c6fd043b094e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7f46a42a09ffc86c21a6c6fd043b094e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;900&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7f46a42a09ffc86c21a6c6fd043b094e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7f46a42a09ffc86c21a6c6fd043b094e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>这场“佛系”旅行有一个色彩缤纷的开始。其实吴哥窟的热气球并不热门，其实暹粒郊区的地面景观并没有那么亮眼，但我还是想感受一下飞屋环球的乐趣。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-29c6631687c65bb25ab6b0ecffbded5c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1500\" data-rawheight=\"998\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1500\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-29c6631687c65bb25ab6b0ecffbded5c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1500&#39; height=&#39;998&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1500\" data-rawheight=\"998\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1500\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-29c6631687c65bb25ab6b0ecffbded5c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-29c6631687c65bb25ab6b0ecffbded5c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>贡开金字塔和柬泰边境的柏威夏寺距离暹粒有三个半小时的车程，来回七个小时有些疲惫，但这是值得的。再荒凉，再边远又如何，无法隔离阻挡人们对信仰的坚守。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-68b97c151de0014cace010c329e3996b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"1220\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-68b97c151de0014cace010c329e3996b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1220&#39; height=&#39;1220&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1220\" data-rawheight=\"1220\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1220\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-68b97c151de0014cace010c329e3996b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-68b97c151de0014cace010c329e3996b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>塔布隆寺是我在吴哥窟最喜欢的寺庙，因为这里的榕树充满了灵性。人们遗忘了这座寺庙，岁月风化了这座寺庙，它陈旧了，斑驳了，这些榕树却毫不在意，仍旧依附着它，陪伴着它。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5de5c5750b54c071569c9b6d4b41a26d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"757\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5de5c5750b54c071569c9b6d4b41a26d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1010&#39; height=&#39;757&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"757\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5de5c5750b54c071569c9b6d4b41a26d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5de5c5750b54c071569c9b6d4b41a26d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在塔布隆寺饶有兴趣的“翻拍”了一次《古墓丽影》。当年世人还未曾揭开塔布隆寺的面纱，一定无比的惊为天人吧。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-287ede25a499b6834c9e0a879b67ba07_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-287ede25a499b6834c9e0a879b67ba07_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1020&#39; height=&#39;1020&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-287ede25a499b6834c9e0a879b67ba07_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-287ede25a499b6834c9e0a879b67ba07_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在小吴哥看日出印象特别深刻，与体型庞大的西方人PK最佳观影位置实在占不到优势，但这并不妨碍我们观看日出的心情。第一次觉得人文带来的冲击远比视觉美图的冲击来得更加震撼，更加让人难以忘却。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f8a1579d19258e79982175da94fd6e46_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1280\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1280\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f8a1579d19258e79982175da94fd6e46_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1280&#39; height=&#39;1280&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1280\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1280\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f8a1579d19258e79982175da94fd6e46_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f8a1579d19258e79982175da94fd6e46_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>尽管柬埔寨的海关很黑，尽管天气炎热晒到快要中暑，尽管很多景点的五层小塔结构都十分雷同，但我在游记中仍然舍不得说吴哥窟半点不好。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-93d429a789294580cc60fafc72d82533_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"720\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-93d429a789294580cc60fafc72d82533_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;720&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"720\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-93d429a789294580cc60fafc72d82533_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-93d429a789294580cc60fafc72d82533_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>荒凉与文化的交织，早已在心中打下了烙印。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe476cdc7568adc4119ff1203caa553f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"940\" data-rawheight=\"940\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"940\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe476cdc7568adc4119ff1203caa553f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;940&#39; height=&#39;940&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"940\" data-rawheight=\"940\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"940\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe476cdc7568adc4119ff1203caa553f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe476cdc7568adc4119ff1203caa553f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>笑，纳万物而不惧。</p><p>包容了爱恨，超越了生死，经过了漫长的岁月，高棉的微笑终得以传递给了后世。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-adf6c0dd53ccf72115057e64ad0fecd3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1130\" data-rawheight=\"1130\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1130\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-adf6c0dd53ccf72115057e64ad0fecd3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1130&#39; height=&#39;1130&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1130\" data-rawheight=\"1130\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1130\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-adf6c0dd53ccf72115057e64ad0fecd3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-adf6c0dd53ccf72115057e64ad0fecd3_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2>一场“新”动之旅</h2><p><b>2017年4月，新加坡</b></p><p>如果让我做亲子旅行的推介，我一定首推新加坡。</p><p>圣淘沙岛上，即使花上两天，也玩不完所有项目：可以去环球影城；可以去海边玩沙；可以去iFly体验模拟高空跳伞。还有海洋馆，还有时光之翼，还有滑车，还有很多很多娱乐探险等待着小朋友们~</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45e19cbe1ff971e9f3f40a3ef69bbaac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45e19cbe1ff971e9f3f40a3ef69bbaac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1020&#39; height=&#39;1020&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1020\" data-rawheight=\"1020\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1020\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45e19cbe1ff971e9f3f40a3ef69bbaac_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45e19cbe1ff971e9f3f40a3ef69bbaac_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6da72d21cc7a8074b156f29b59cc614a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"920\" data-rawheight=\"920\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"920\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6da72d21cc7a8074b156f29b59cc614a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;920&#39; height=&#39;920&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"920\" data-rawheight=\"920\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"920\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6da72d21cc7a8074b156f29b59cc614a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6da72d21cc7a8074b156f29b59cc614a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>当然，在新加坡，更需要我们感受的，是它作为一个发达文明社会的多元、有序和涵养。</p><p>干净又井然有序的滨海湾，花穹雨林里来自全世界的奇花异草，甘榜格南区的苏丹大教堂，《我可能不会爱上你》的拍摄地哈吉路和摩天轮，还有唐人街周边的美食店藏龙卧虎，一下满足了吃货的味蕾，拉近了和这个国家的距离。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e48167defc7a390704fd1956fd62226d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1180\" data-rawheight=\"914\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1180\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e48167defc7a390704fd1956fd62226d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1180&#39; height=&#39;914&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1180\" data-rawheight=\"914\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1180\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e48167defc7a390704fd1956fd62226d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e48167defc7a390704fd1956fd62226d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>是啊，新加坡没有大山大海，孤烟荒漠，鸟鸣山涧，因此第一眼的印象难免有点怅然若失。所以它适合深度游，适合慢慢融入其中，体验它带给你的心动。总之，呆越久，你就会越中意它。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-492e04d03a482d97af6477d89cf7f2c6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1000\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-492e04d03a482d97af6477d89cf7f2c6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;1000&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1000\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-492e04d03a482d97af6477d89cf7f2c6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-492e04d03a482d97af6477d89cf7f2c6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><b>第一次一个月的长途旅行</b></p><p>去法西葡，是这个夏天做出的最棒的决定！</p><p><b>2017年6月，巴黎，法国</b></p><p>海明威说：“假如你有幸年轻时在巴黎生活过，那么你的余生无论去往哪里，它都会与你同在”。现在回想起来，这并不是文人骚客一时感性的抒发。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e934faa4ca7e34e5f4a51126cd6d6115_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1140\" data-rawheight=\"1140\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1140\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e934faa4ca7e34e5f4a51126cd6d6115_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1140&#39; height=&#39;1140&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1140\" data-rawheight=\"1140\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1140\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e934faa4ca7e34e5f4a51126cd6d6115_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e934faa4ca7e34e5f4a51126cd6d6115_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>巴黎最打动我的地方就是各大博物馆和美术馆。我以为我对这些习以为常的画作并不感冒，却不知不觉被它们收服了。还想再去一次卢浮宫，去看看胜利女神像，去看看《自由引导人民》，去看看没有看完的馆藏。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8b069f1efa1ba84c85aa7b820ba858d5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"1220\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8b069f1efa1ba84c85aa7b820ba858d5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;915&#39; height=&#39;1220&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"1220\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8b069f1efa1ba84c85aa7b820ba858d5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8b069f1efa1ba84c85aa7b820ba858d5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>为了《美女与野兽》的原型城堡，专门跑去卢瓦尔河畔的香波堡和舍农索堡打了个卡。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-673a7215bd79ae37ad77e8b361348620_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1129\" data-rawheight=\"846\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1129\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-673a7215bd79ae37ad77e8b361348620_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1100&#39; height=&#39;825&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1100\" data-rawheight=\"825\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1100\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4a2f2afe524df01556e489bf30a49c28_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4a2f2afe524df01556e489bf30a49c28_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>来到南法最不能错过的，私以为还是阿维尼翁戏剧节。2017年恰逢阿维尼翁戏剧节70周年，路演热闹非凡，十分有趣。唯有对戏剧无限热爱，才会如此热情洋溢，让整个小镇都化身成为戏剧的舞台吧。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3839967f0df85ad0e26b6f13f3fa6a46_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"960\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3839967f0df85ad0e26b6f13f3fa6a46_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;960&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"960\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3839967f0df85ad0e26b6f13f3fa6a46_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3839967f0df85ad0e26b6f13f3fa6a46_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e39eb189076add308e31089e1a4195fc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"990\" data-rawheight=\"990\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"990\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e39eb189076add308e31089e1a4195fc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;990&#39; height=&#39;990&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"990\" data-rawheight=\"990\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"990\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e39eb189076add308e31089e1a4195fc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e39eb189076add308e31089e1a4195fc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><b>2017年7月，尼斯&amp;埃兹，法国/摩纳哥</b></p><p>喜欢尼斯的慢生活，觉得旅行不需要时时都大山大海，有时平平淡淡的融入到当地的生活也有一份惬意和自在。</p><p>喜欢埃兹中世纪古城的原汁原味，喜欢坐在山顶俯瞰地中海。</p><p>喜欢摩纳哥低调奢华的处事不惊。</p><p>这三座城相隔并不远，却能让你领略到不同的风味，充满了探索的乐趣。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe890555ece733d6fed3ce839a0b075b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1280\" data-rawheight=\"960\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1280\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe890555ece733d6fed3ce839a0b075b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1280&#39; height=&#39;960&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1280\" data-rawheight=\"960\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1280\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe890555ece733d6fed3ce839a0b075b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fe890555ece733d6fed3ce839a0b075b_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3bf897e25527ca75e7683374566dad8b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1120\" data-rawheight=\"840\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1120\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3bf897e25527ca75e7683374566dad8b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1120&#39; height=&#39;840&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1120\" data-rawheight=\"840\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1120\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3bf897e25527ca75e7683374566dad8b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3bf897e25527ca75e7683374566dad8b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><b>2017年7月，巴塞罗那，西班牙</b></p><p>人类在不断进步，审美在不断革新，所以历经百年，高迪的设计还能经得住考验，他是有多厉害。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70330fe1b3d894ffb02a0f165c7c3f76_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1490\" data-rawheight=\"1038\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1490\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70330fe1b3d894ffb02a0f165c7c3f76_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1490&#39; height=&#39;1038&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1490\" data-rawheight=\"1038\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1490\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70330fe1b3d894ffb02a0f165c7c3f76_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70330fe1b3d894ffb02a0f165c7c3f76_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>世界上有无数座教堂，但圣家堂是如此的独一无二。来过圣家堂的人大概都会想：等2026年圣家堂竣工时，一定要再回来看看。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9c214e6caffed2ce882f353623b855d9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"802\" data-rawheight=\"1070\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"802\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9c214e6caffed2ce882f353623b855d9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;810&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"810\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9e2f4ac8a974e7b6952ff535433b2a7f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9e2f4ac8a974e7b6952ff535433b2a7f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>其实Forest先生并不是巴萨的球迷，但他还是兴冲冲跑去诺坎普了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ce4cf1507db1530e77b7c992c5030755_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1150\" data-rawheight=\"898\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1150\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ce4cf1507db1530e77b7c992c5030755_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1150&#39; height=&#39;898&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1150\" data-rawheight=\"898\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1150\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ce4cf1507db1530e77b7c992c5030755_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ce4cf1507db1530e77b7c992c5030755_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><b>2017年7月，格拉纳达，西班牙</b></p><p>见到了阿尔罕布拉宫，格拉纳达就没有白来。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e00b60c45ad181c157aad1afcb40ea4e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1420\" data-rawheight=\"794\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1420\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e00b60c45ad181c157aad1afcb40ea4e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1060&#39; height=&#39;795&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1060\" data-rawheight=\"795\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1060\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b5d798efbd41a5c69d3b1a72b3ac904d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b5d798efbd41a5c69d3b1a72b3ac904d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><b>2017年7月，塞维利亚，西班牙</b></p><p>这世界上有许多座哥特式教堂，但最大的哥特式教堂在塞维利亚；</p><p>这世界上有许多的西班牙广场见证了西班牙曾经的霸主辉煌，但最大的西班牙广场在塞维利亚；</p><p>这世界上有许多地方表演弗朗明哥，但最正宗的发源地在塞维利亚；</p><p>这里还有《权利的游戏》的取景地：塞维利亚王宫和斗牛场；</p><p>所以这座城市入选了《孤独星球》2018年的十大旅行城市，我一点也不觉得奇怪。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4cc51394cc390bd7b60f5e948a46f2be_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1100\" data-rawheight=\"825\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1100\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4cc51394cc390bd7b60f5e948a46f2be_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1170&#39; height=&#39;877&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1170\" data-rawheight=\"877\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1170\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4b7d6731a12a5b57f5bb5864c19eb267_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4b7d6731a12a5b57f5bb5864c19eb267_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>博物馆和王宫不让拍照的规定，让这些美好的瞬间只能留在记忆里。马德里应该会在去一次的吧，普拉多博物馆还没逛完呢，也没有去伯纳乌球场看场球。</p><p><b>2017年7月，塞戈维亚，西班牙</b></p><p>《睡美人》的原型城堡在中世纪原来是一座军事院校，并木有公主，囧。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31356f4b5a6bc8242355330c467fc12f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1140\" data-rawheight=\"855\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1140\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31356f4b5a6bc8242355330c467fc12f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1140&#39; height=&#39;855&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1140\" data-rawheight=\"855\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1140\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31356f4b5a6bc8242355330c467fc12f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31356f4b5a6bc8242355330c467fc12f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>虽然把自己的脸拍得很大，但还是很喜欢这张照片~</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1fc14602f76afa01c0e05b1059ed8f39_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1280\" data-rawheight=\"960\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1280\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1fc14602f76afa01c0e05b1059ed8f39_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;1000&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1000\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b86c34d058d4c49fe556e1c2ced76ac0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b86c34d058d4c49fe556e1c2ced76ac0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><b>2017年7月，辛特拉&amp;罗卡角，葡萄牙</b></p><p>陆止于此、海始于斯。在欧洲大陆最西端罗卡角结束了一个月的旅行。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9780a9158bba2e9f01122c5e642aa725_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1250\" data-rawheight=\"937\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1250\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9780a9158bba2e9f01122c5e642aa725_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1250&#39; height=&#39;937&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1250\" data-rawheight=\"937\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1250\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9780a9158bba2e9f01122c5e642aa725_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9780a9158bba2e9f01122c5e642aa725_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>回想起来，一切仿佛昨日重现。</p><p>旅行到底能带来什么？大概就是让我们对未见之事、未知之事永葆一份新鲜，永留一份期待吧。</p><h2>旅行，是两辈子的事</h2><p><b>2017年11月，普吉岛，泰国</b></p><p>每年都会带父母出去旅行一次，今年选在了普吉岛。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ed80e3cf52d45781bc2663f4fca82e8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1400\" data-rawheight=\"935\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1400\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ed80e3cf52d45781bc2663f4fca82e8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1400&#39; height=&#39;935&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1400\" data-rawheight=\"935\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1400\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ed80e3cf52d45781bc2663f4fca82e8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ed80e3cf52d45781bc2663f4fca82e8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>每到一个海岛，最念念不忘的就是海边的日落。视野开阔，布景简单，就能留下最佳的视觉效果。这个时候，太阳最温柔，光线最柔和，最能抚平一日的疲惫。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e1ef1d7d89b7e4cd77188644f8d75b87_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1616\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1616\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e1ef1d7d89b7e4cd77188644f8d75b87_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1616&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1616\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1616\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e1ef1d7d89b7e4cd77188644f8d75b87_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e1ef1d7d89b7e4cd77188644f8d75b87_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>妈妈信佛，她会虔诚的参拜岛上的寺庙。新的一年，希望父母身体健康，万事顺意。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7f1574683c13de858c52d15cd5e4dfc8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1430\" data-rawheight=\"955\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1430\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7f1574683c13de858c52d15cd5e4dfc8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1430&#39; height=&#39;955&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1430\" data-rawheight=\"955\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1430\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7f1574683c13de858c52d15cd5e4dfc8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7f1574683c13de858c52d15cd5e4dfc8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><b>斯米兰&amp;苏林，泰国</b></p><p>到了普吉岛很头疼如何选离岛游，因为妈妈已经去过沙巴了，普通的浮潜肯定是满足不了她的需求了。刚好斯米兰和苏林开岛了，就索性去个远一点的地方潜水。</p><p>到了斯米兰，才发现原来斯米兰十分大热，一点也不小众，人多到好似遭遇了国庆假日。不过，除开这些人为的因素，岛的质量实属上乘。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3795bf23f9e9ffba8015413245c0e473_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3795bf23f9e9ffba8015413245c0e473_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3795bf23f9e9ffba8015413245c0e473_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3795bf23f9e9ffba8015413245c0e473_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>斯米兰水下的景致尚可，经过半年的休养生息，珊瑚没有白化得那么厉害。估计游客太多了，在7号岛附近浮潜时并没有碰到传说中的海龟。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a57e42f4ced34788a3ffb30c489bc73d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"757\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a57e42f4ced34788a3ffb30c489bc73d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1010&#39; height=&#39;757&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1010\" data-rawheight=\"757\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1010\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a57e42f4ced34788a3ffb30c489bc73d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a57e42f4ced34788a3ffb30c489bc73d_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6d9cb76fac99d18d428edfc22221052b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1100\" data-rawheight=\"825\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1100\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6d9cb76fac99d18d428edfc22221052b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1100&#39; height=&#39;825&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1100\" data-rawheight=\"825\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1100\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6d9cb76fac99d18d428edfc22221052b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6d9cb76fac99d18d428edfc22221052b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在泰国政府的保护下，希望这九个美丽的岛屿不必像达差岛一样永久性关闭。</p><p>苏林岛的浮潜着实给了我很大的惊喜。水质极佳，可以如此近距离的调戏尼莫。他们不安分的在海葵离游来游去，对来访者充满了好奇，这场海底总动员十分热闹。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4df15fc0f0dcffaeea0c0850bd1868e8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"832\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4df15fc0f0dcffaeea0c0850bd1868e8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1110&#39; height=&#39;832&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"832\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4df15fc0f0dcffaeea0c0850bd1868e8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4df15fc0f0dcffaeea0c0850bd1868e8_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-67d537a1a72a4ef514347956255e10b7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"832\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-67d537a1a72a4ef514347956255e10b7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1110&#39; height=&#39;832&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"832\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-67d537a1a72a4ef514347956255e10b7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-67d537a1a72a4ef514347956255e10b7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在苏林浮潜，一度以为自己回到帕劳大断层的浅海区了。不愿错过每一处的细节，拼命的将海底的美景映入眼中，收入记忆。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c1f5381706ffe486b63b05c85bfa09ac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c1f5381706ffe486b63b05c85bfa09ac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c1f5381706ffe486b63b05c85bfa09ac_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c1f5381706ffe486b63b05c85bfa09ac_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cfeff87e9d2d259c0cd65ed4450d3286_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"990\" data-rawheight=\"742\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"990\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cfeff87e9d2d259c0cd65ed4450d3286_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;990&#39; height=&#39;742&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"990\" data-rawheight=\"742\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"990\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cfeff87e9d2d259c0cd65ed4450d3286_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cfeff87e9d2d259c0cd65ed4450d3286_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>普吉岛前往苏林岛，需要两个小时的车程+两个小时的快艇。好的风景都需要跋山涉水，不辞辛苦方能领略啊。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0d37cd3a5d30db7c12f61bfad4a1456c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1170\" data-rawheight=\"877\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1170\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0d37cd3a5d30db7c12f61bfad4a1456c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1170&#39; height=&#39;877&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1170\" data-rawheight=\"877\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1170\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0d37cd3a5d30db7c12f61bfad4a1456c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0d37cd3a5d30db7c12f61bfad4a1456c_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e054c5a6db8935cbe8c89b98ede7ac9d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1050\" data-rawheight=\"787\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1050\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e054c5a6db8935cbe8c89b98ede7ac9d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1050&#39; height=&#39;787&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1050\" data-rawheight=\"787\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1050\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e054c5a6db8935cbe8c89b98ede7ac9d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e054c5a6db8935cbe8c89b98ede7ac9d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><b>2017年11月，Teamlab，深圳</b></p><p>从普吉岛回来，Teamlab深圳展已经快接近尾声了，其实我之前已经去过了，我知道妈妈看了我的朋友圈后很想去看，所以赶在撤展之前就又陪她去了一趟。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b0eb72ab421141dbf3716ec8f5d89ced_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1160\" data-rawheight=\"773\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1160\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b0eb72ab421141dbf3716ec8f5d89ced_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1160&#39; height=&#39;773&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1160\" data-rawheight=\"773\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1160\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b0eb72ab421141dbf3716ec8f5d89ced_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b0eb72ab421141dbf3716ec8f5d89ced_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在Teamlab展厅里，妈妈高兴得和孩子一样。昏黄的灯光抹去了她眼角的皱纹，她是如此的温柔。看到她如少女般的笑脸，内心觉得十分满足和骄傲。今年一直都在旅行，拍下了无数好看的照片，但觉得最美的照片就是这一张了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3dc902f4c55e0c755c98e545785c4600_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1300\" data-rawheight=\"866\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1300\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3dc902f4c55e0c755c98e545785c4600_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1300&#39; height=&#39;866&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1300\" data-rawheight=\"866\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1300\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3dc902f4c55e0c755c98e545785c4600_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3dc902f4c55e0c755c98e545785c4600_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2>最美的风景，都不及你在身边</h2><p>一直觉得自己很幸运，另一半的旅游习惯和爱好和自己出奇的一致。谢谢一路相守的Forest先生，再美的风景，都不及你在身边。期待2018年与你一起的旅行。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b383d3f672df7a7091d27990008ea00_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1100\" data-rawheight=\"822\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1100\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b383d3f672df7a7091d27990008ea00_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1100&#39; height=&#39;822&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1100\" data-rawheight=\"822\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1100\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b383d3f672df7a7091d27990008ea00_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b383d3f672df7a7091d27990008ea00_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c17eadf5e9b247198cbe0f39ce4126d5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1140\" data-rawheight=\"852\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1140\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c17eadf5e9b247198cbe0f39ce4126d5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;
